overview: Are you ready for some awesome action? Well, too bad if you're not, because here comes one of the hottest lesbian movies of the year. We commissioned the greatest lesbian director of all time, Jimm Gunn to shoot this awesome series! In this volume you've got 3 scenes, 2 of which are 7 girl strap on gang bangs. Watch as Penthouse Pet of the month Lanny Barbie gets gang banged and then gives it right back in an awesome reverse gang bang! Don't miss this one!!
title: Girly Gang Bang: Strap-on Edition
